name: GrazHoppers
description:
GrazHoppers is a simple run-and-jump game that taks place in Graz. Here are you going to encounter different, famous places from Graz, like the Schlossberg or Jakominiplatz.
It is also possible to pick up coins to upgrade your character's perfomance, like speed and health.
The goal of the game is to go through every level in Graz and catching the train at Hauptbahnhof.
